fields.name: BitRate
fields.description: The stream bit rate for the audio track.

fields.name: DashSettings
fields.description: The DASH specific setting for the audio track.

fields.name: DisplayName
fields.description: The display name of the audio track on a video player. In HLS, this maps to the NAME attribute of EXT-X-MEDIA.

fields.name: FileName
fields.description: The file name to the source file. This file is located in the storage container of the asset.

fields.name: HlsSettings
fields.description: The HLS specific setting for the audio track.

fields.name: LanguageCode
fields.description: The RFC5646 language code for the audio track.

fields.name: Mpeg4TrackId
fields.description: The MPEG-4 audio track ID for the audio track.
